posts.post_content:
Question - What do you get if you fold this HOFer (Huggins)?

Answer - You get that HOFer (Bresnahan)?

Bresnahan and Huggins double fold BVG 4

Two for the price of two - only $88.00 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t-party/13702/t201-hugginsbresnahan[/IMG]

If you want it, take it.
Price dropped to $44 each for Bresnahan and Huggins, but they must be sold as a pair.:D
Typical of Frank to try pulling a fast one!

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1844726]Typical of Frank to try pulling a fast one![/QUOTE]

If I sell them individually, each would only have one leg.  Not to mention that dividing their heads would require splitting more hairs that I care to imagine.

This type of thoughtless rebuke I find most distasteful.:eek::eek:


























































:D:D
Can I Mecca you an offer?
